mapper.insert: insert into TBL_FILE (FILE_NUMBER, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, BOARD_NUMBER) values (SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{fileName}, #{fileUploadPath}, #{fileUuid}, #{boardNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NUMBER, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, BOARD_NUMBER FROM TBL_FILE WHERE FILE_UPLOAD_PATH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 6, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
